short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: filter people in images using PTechFilter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to enjoy a safe browsing on the internet : it greys out human bodies found on images displayed on your browser.

You may find some images that are wrongly greyed, or that should be greyed but the algorithm did not detect them. 
Also, some websites bypass this extension and remove the filtered images, we are actively working on improving this extension, please notify us at https://www.ptechfilter.com/contact 

This is not a traditional internet filter or parental-control tool, this extension has been developed for adults who want to enjoy a safe browsing experience without being exposed to semi-nudes images.

This is a first version of the extension, later versions will be more accurate and fast.

If you find some issues, please submit them here : 
https://www.ptechfilter.com/contact
